hero.title: Launch Your Business with Allset Template
hero.description: Effortlessly create stunning landing pages and SEO-optimized blog posts using AI. Get your business online and visible in minutes.

mainFeatures.title: AI-Powered Landing Page Generation
mainFeatures.description: Generate compelling landing page content in seconds using our AI dashboard. No coding required!

mainFeatures.title: SEO Blog Post Creation
mainFeatures.description: Boost your search ranking with AI-generated blog posts. Provide valuable content and attract more customers.

mainFeatures.title: Easy-to-Use Dashboard
mainFeatures.description: Manage all your content creation from one central dashboard. Simple, intuitive, and effective.

featureDescription: Unlock the power of AI to create stunning landing pages and SEO-optimized content that drives results.

features.title: AI Content Generation
features.description: Let our AI write compelling copy for your landing pages and blog posts.

features.title: SEO Optimization
features.description: Improve your search engine ranking with AI-powered SEO suggestions.

features.title: Customizable Templates
features.description: Choose from a variety of templates and customize them to match your brand.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Track your website traffic and performance with our detailed analytics dashboard.

features.title: Content Scheduling
features.description: Schedule your blog posts in advance to maintain a consistent content calendar.

features.title: 24/7 Support
features.description: Get help whenever you need it with our dedicated support team.

cta.title: Ready to Launch Your Business?
cta.description: Start creating your landing page and blog posts today with Allset Template.

questions.question: What is Allset Template?
questions.answer: Allset Template is an AI-powered platform that helps you create landing pages and SEO-optimized blog posts quickly and easily.

questions.question: Do I need coding experience to use Allset Template?
questions.answer: No, Allset Template is designed to be user-friendly and requires no coding experience.

questions.question: How does the AI content generation work?
questions.answer: Our AI uses advanced algorithms to generate high-quality content based on your input and preferences.

questions.question: Can I customize the templates?
questions.answer: Yes, you can customize the templates to match your brand and style.

questions.question: What kind of support do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer 24/7 support via email, chat, and phone.

gallery.title: Our Work

contact.successMessage: Thank you for reaching out! We’ll get back to you soon.
